lead_paragraph: Manchester City winger Raheem Sterling is on course to become one of the world's best players under the guidance of manager Pep Guardiola after the youngster seemed to lose his way last season, Celtic boss Brendan Rodgers has said.

headline.print_headline: Sterling Back on Track Under Guardiola, Says Rodgers
headline.main: Sterling Back on Track Under Guardiola, Says Rodgers

snippet: Manchester City winger Raheem Sterling is on course to become one of the world's best players under the guidance of manager Pep Guardiola after the youngster seemed to lose his way last season, Celtic boss Brendan Rodgers has said....
